title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1811.3 - State closeout agreement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1811.3 - State closeout agreement

State Regulations
(a) Subsequent to the determination of the amount pursuant to section
1811.2
of this Part, the
municipality or municipal urban renewal agency shall submit for concurrence by
the commissioner a State closeout agreement which shall: (1)
set forth the "Net State Financial

Settlement" and provide for payment of such difference to either the
municipality or municipal urban renewal agency or reimbursement of such
difference to the State for overpayments; and
(2)
contain such other terms as the
commissioner may deem necessary to adequately protect the interests of the

State. (b) The
municipality and the municipal urban renewal agency shall submit, in addition
to the State closeout agreement, the following: (1)
resolutions from the municipality and the
municipal urban renewal agency authorizing the execution of the State closeout
agreement; (2)
evidence of no
pending litigation with respect to the project; and
(3)
any other documents that the commissioner
may deem necessary in light of the particular circumstances of the
project. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1811.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
